Package com.flipkart.business

Interface CustomerServiceInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CustomerService
    public interface CustomerServiceInterface
    Interface for the CustomerService class providing business logic related to customers.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean authenticateCustomer​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
      Authenticates a customer based on provided login credentials.
      java.lang.String getCustomerIdByLoginCreds​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
      Retrieves the customer ID based on provided login credentials.
      void registerCustomer​(Customer customer)
      Registers a new customer in the system.
      void updateCustomerInfo​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String email, java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String customerId)
      Updates the information of an existing customer.

    • Method Detail

      • registerCustomer

        void registerCustomer​(Customer customer)
        Registers a new customer in the system.
        Parameters:
        customer - The Customer object containing registration information.

      • authenticateCustomer

        boolean authenticateCustomer​(java.lang.String username,
                             java.lang.String password)
        Authenticates a customer based on provided login credentials.
        Parameters:
        username - The username of the customer.
        password - The password of the customer.
        Returns:
        True if the authentication is successful, false otherwise.

      • getCustomerIdByLoginCreds

        java.lang.String getCustomerIdByLoginCreds​(java.lang.String username,
                                           java.lang.String password)
        Retrieves the customer ID based on provided login credentials.
        Parameters:
        username - The username of the customer.
        password - The password of the customer.
        Returns:
        The customer ID if credentials are valid, otherwise null.

      • updateCustomerInfo

        void updateCustomerInfo​(java.lang.String name,
                        java.lang.String email,
                        java.lang.String username,
                        java.lang.String password,
                        java.lang.String customerId)
        Updates the information of an existing customer.
        Parameters:
        name - The updated name of the customer.
        email - The updated email of the customer.
        username - The updated username of the customer.
        password - The updated password of the customer.
        customerId - The ID of the customer whose information needs to be updated.
